transArray.content: I made a reservation for a relative. I chose Home Inn first but could only guarantee cash payment. Later I changed my mind after seeing that this hotel could pay online. I heard from relatives that the room was nice. Close to the train station, you can walk there

Thank you very much for choosing Hanting among many hotels. Thank you for your support and recognition of the hotel. The hotel currently has a new breakfast feature. The robot can also deliver meals to the room. The hotel has a free laundry room. We look forward to your next stay.
